Fingerprint Hat

is a knitted hat that uses a reaction diffusion algorithmn as a stitch pattern.

Brioche knitting is a method of knitting that makes a really squishy fabric with defined ridges. When I learned this technique I was reminded of Nervous System’s Coral Cup and I had to attempt to create the same structure through knitting. By placing random increases and decreases throughout the hat, this branching stucture is achieved.

I like working with awesome people on awesome projects.
Let me know what you’re working on. Drop me a line at
